## About

Abdul Rasheed Grocery is your trusted neighborhood grocery store in Sayh Mudayrah, Ajman, UAE. This repository contains the source code for our website.

âœ¨ Fresh groceries and daily essentials

## Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/Mohd-Aflah/Abdul-Rasheed-Grocery.git

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev
```
